item.title: Do Eye Floaters Trigger Health Anxiety?
item.description:
It starts with a shadow. A thread. A flicker in your vision.
You blink. It moves.
And just like that, you’re down the rabbit hole:

“Is this something serious?”
“Is it retinal detachment?”
“What if I go blind?”
“Why won’t it go away?”
“What if no one believes me?”

You’re not just seeing a floater — you’re fighting a fear storm.

If you’re wondering “Do eye floaters trigger health anxiety?”
The answer is yes. And here’s why.

item.title: Can Floaters Cause Intrusive Thoughts?
item.description:
You’re not just seeing floaters — you’re thinking about them.
Over and over.
And somewhere along the way, your thoughts started spiraling:

“What if this never stops?”
“What if I go blind?”
“What if I go crazy from this?”

Now the floaters aren’t just visual — they’ve become mental landmines.

If you’re wondering “Can floaters cause intrusive thoughts?”, the answer is complex — but not uncommon.

Let’s unpack it.

item.title: Why Floaters Feel Worse When You're Alone with Your Thoughts
item.description:

And suddenly… you notice it.

It’s not your imagination.
There’s a real psychological reason why stillness makes visual distractions feel louder.
